name: Courtyard Housing Complex
description: A thoughtfully designed housing complex centered around shared courtyards that promote community interaction and natural ventilation.

name: Green Office Complex
description: Sustainable office complex featuring green roofs, natural ventilation, and rainwater harvesting systems.

name: Heritage Boutique Hotel
description: Adaptive reuse of a 19th-century haveli transformed into a luxury boutique hotel that celebrates Rajasthani architectural heritage.

name: Urban Loft Renovation
description: Complete renovation of a 1920s industrial loft into a contemporary urban living space.

name: Villa Sunrise
description: A modern villa design that captures the essence of sunrise with its east-facing orientation and warm material palette.
